caption: This place is awesome ! Good taste of music , clean and food taste great . The service is amazing . A jewel in Hialeah ! ❤️
Food was excellent. Prices were excellent  service just as excellent. Def going back. Thank u.
Great Services and the Best Pizza Ever!!
Best 🍕 pizza I will recommend it to anyone who comes from out of town best sirve very professional
Very nice venue, excellent service, delicious pizza and pasta, great prices for the area.

(Translated by Google) Delighted with the quality and excellent service of the Yaimara shop assistant. I recommend them, some of the best places to go as a family!  (Original) Encantada con la calidad y el excelente servicio de la dependiente Yaimara. Se los recomiendo, unos d los mejores lugares para ir en familia!

(Translated by Google) Very good pizzas and very good attention, thank you To the cheila waitress for the kindness  (Original) Muy buenas pizzas y muy buenas atención gracias A la mesera cheila por la amabilidad

(Translated by Google) SINCERELY IS VERY SURPRISED WITH THIS PLACE, SINCE YOU ENTER THIS EXTREMELY COZY, VERY GOOD SERVICE AND CLEANING, THE OWNER CONSTANTLY PENDING ANY CONCERN THAT ARISES, I CANNOT LEAVE THE FOOD OF MY WARMTH IMPRESSED WITH THE CREAM THAT WAS REALLY EXQUISITE FOR A LONG TIME YOU COULDN'T FIND A PLACE WHERE THE CREAM WAS SO RICH AND THE COD CROQUETTES SUPER, AS WELL AS THE ITALIAN AND CUBAN PIZZA, IN FINAL ALL WHAT WE ORDERED WAS 100 %, THIS PLACE WILL ALREADY SEE WUE YOU WILL NOT REPENT, I HOPE THEY MAINTAIN ITS QUALITY, I WILL COME BACK SOON, AND MY RESPECT TO THE COOK  (Original) SINCERAMENTE QUEDE MUY SORPRENDIDA CON ESTE LUGAR , DESDE QUE ENTRAS  ESTA EXTREMADAMENTE  ACOGEDOR, MUY BUENO EL SERVICIO Y LA LIMPIEZA,  EL DUEŃO CONSTANTEMENTE  AL PENDIENTE  DE CUALQUIER  INQUIETUD QUE SE TE PRESENTE ,  NO PUEDO DEJAR DE MENCIONAR LA CALIDAD DE LA COMIDA , MI ESPOSO QUEDO IMPRESIONADO CON LA CREMA DE QUEDO QUE REALMENTE ESTABA EXQUISITA HACIA RATO NO ENCONTRABS UN LUGAR DONDE LA CREMA ESTUVIERA TAN  RICA  Y LAS CROQUETAS DE BACALAO SUPER , ASI COMO LA PIZZA ITALIANA Y LA CUBANA , EN FIN TODO LO QUE ORDENAMOS ESTUVO ESPECTACULAR , RECOMIENDO AL 100% , ESTE LUGAR YA VERA WUE NO SE VA A ARREPENTIR , OJALA MANTENGAN SU CALIDAD ,  ODVIAMENTE PRONTO REGRESARE , , Y MIS RESPETOS AL COCINERO 😇😇😇😇

(Translated by Google) Excellent service, treatment and delicious food. It is not a regular pizza that you find in any restaurant, it is different and I do not know why, you have to try it especially the vegetable one, I recommend it.  (Original) Excelente servicio, trato y la comida deliciosa. No es una pizza regular que encuentras en cualquier restaurante, es diferente y no sé decir por qué, hay que probarla en especial la de vegetales, la recomiendo.
Excellent attention and very rich food.  A friendly and family place to share a dinner. I will go again.

(Translated by Google) Fantastic place, we felt at home and even more so with the service that Yaimara gave us. My husband and I were delighted with the menu he recommended. Without a doubt I would repeat the visit and be lucky that the same waitress attends us.  (Original) Fantástico lugar, nos sentimos como en casa y aún mas con el servicio que nos brindó Yaimara. Quedamos encantados mi esposo y yo con el menú que nos recomendó. Sin duda repetiría la visita y tener suerte con que nos atienda la misma camarera.

(Translated by Google) It really was a mix between the good service they offered me and the exquisite cod croquettes, I hope they stay that way and that Ms. Yaimara continues to serve me  (Original) Realmente fue una mezcla entre el buen servicio que me ofrecieron y la exquisites de las croqueticas de bacalao.Espero que se mantengan asi y que me siga atendiendo la sra Yaimara

(Translated by Google) I have been visiting them for years and for me they are the best! And this very cozy new place  (Original) Los visito hace años y para mi son los mejores! Y este nuevo  lugar muy acogedor
FRESH FOOD, AMAZING SERVICE, SUPPER ATTENTIVE STAFF. HIGHLY RECOMMEND

(Translated by Google) It seems to me a very nice, clean place that has spectacular pizzas and the customer service is special. I really recommend it a lot.  (Original) Me parece un lugar muy lindo,limpio,que tiene unas pizzas espectaculares y el trato al cliente es especial.La verdad lo recomiendo mucho.
(Translated by Google) Thank you for your good service, all very delicious 🙏🏻🥰  (Original) Gracias x su buen servicio, todo muy delicioso 🙏🏻🥰
Really good! Tasty and great price! Finally something different in Hialeah!
(Translated by Google) Wonderful place, magical, must see when visiting the heart of hialeah!  (Original) Maravilloso lugar , mágico , visita obligada cuando visitas el corazón de hialeah !
Best Cuban food in hialeah. Service is amazing!

(Translated by Google) The pizzas were rich and the cream cheese is very rich. The service from Angelica and Jonathon was very good, I would recommend this restaurant to my family and friends.  (Original) Las pizzas estaban rica y la crema de queso esta muy rica. El servicio de Angelica y Jonathon era muy bueno, yo recomendaria este restaurante a mi familia y amigos.

(Translated by Google) Thanks for your good service I highly recommend this restaurant very good quality of food  (Original) Gracias por su buen  servicio recomiendo mucho este restaurante muy buena calidad de comida

I went today for the first time to this little gem in the Heart  of Hialeah. My husband and I fell in love with the ambiance of this little restaurant and the attentiveness of the waitresses. Food was great, I could tell everything is fresh and homemade. Try the croquettes!!!
(Translated by Google) Nice cozy place excellent service.  (Original) Lugar bonito y acogedor servicio excelente.
Amazing service! Fresh food, cozy place, and family-oriented. Best Cuban pizza!

First time at this restaurant today and I really have to say the decor and the ambient is really awesome, once you step inside you start to feeling relaxed with the music and the lights You can choose from pizza to sandwiches, milkshakes and good wine. I had Bacalao’s croquetas for appetizer and mixed pizza. They were really good and flavorful. I recommend this place if you are around the area and want to have a good time.
Great food and great cafe con leche. Will be back!
🅰️➕  🍕 freshly made and really tasty 🤤

(Translated by Google) Timely and convenient in this area. With a decoration and cleanliness inside that make it very cozy. A family business with years of experience and it shows in the quality of its service. Very good food and smoothies, and the pizzas above all, definitely the best in Miami.  (Original) Oportuno y conveniente en esta zona. Con una decoración y limpieza en el interior que lo hacen bien acogedor. Un negocio familiar con años de experiencia y se nota en la calidad de su servicio. Muy buena comida y batidos, y las pizzas sobre todo, definitivamente la mejor de Miami.

(Translated by Google) The best Cuban pizzas in Miami, in a family atmosphere and excellent service. I recommend it 100 percent.  (Original) Las mejores pizzas cubanas de Miami , en una ambiente familiar y un servicio excelente . Lo recomiendo 100 por ciento .

(Translated by Google) The best Cuban pizza continues to expand throughout Miami and there are 3 locations to satisfy all customers. We are waiting for you at 445 palm av  (Original) La mejor pizza cubana se sigue expandiendo por todo Miami ya son 3 locales para satisfacer a todos los clientes los esperamos en 445 palm av
The place is clean and well decorated. Low prices and great cuban food! The pizza is super yummy! Also, I love the almond milkshake they have!!
Beautiful and cozy atmosphere. I LOVE IT!
